title: Plastic Straw Ban: How Straws Got So Popular to Begin With | Time
body: The paper straw underwent very few changes in the decades that followed Mr. Stone's infamous mint julep, aside from attaining its now famous bendy-ness in the 1930s thanks to an inventor in San ...
readable_content: -USER_ONCE (2023-12-08): This provides a detailed historical account of the plastic straw and its rise in popularity.
